context: Market capitalization of $17.43 billion (April 2025). ARR reached $2.26 billion with 14% YoY growth. Competitive landscape includes 945 active competitors (142 funded, 85 exited). Market share in construction tools at 6.79%. Strong competition from both hardware/positioning providers and software/BIM platforms. Cloud-based construction management and BIM integration becoming critical differentiators.

competitors.name: Hexagon AB
competitors.notes: Top competitor with broad portfolio of hardware and software solutions for construction technology, machine control, and surveying

competitors.name: Autodesk
competitors.notes: Major software competitor with BIM Collaborate Pro (formerly BIM360), 3D design, engineering, and construction management solutions

competitors.name: Topcon Positioning Systems
competitors.notes: Key rival in surveying and construction with comprehensive positioning and measurement technologies

competitors.name: Leica Geosystems
competitors.notes: Surveying and construction equipment/software competitor in geospatial market

competitors.name: Esri
competitors.notes: Competition in software and geospatial data with GIS platforms

competitors.name: Yardi Systems
competitors.notes: 53.06% market share in Other Real Estate and Construction Tools category

competitors.name: CoStar
competitors.notes: 24.35% market share in Other Real Estate and Construction Tools category

competitors.name: Procore
competitors.notes: Cloud-based construction project management software with unlimited users, competitor to Trimble ProjectSight

competitors.name: Digital Construction Works
competitors.notes: Construction software solutions competitor

competitors.name: Infrakit
competitors.notes: Construction technology platform

competitors.name: Planstack
competitors.notes: Construction planning and management software

competitors.name: InEight
competitors.notes: Construction project management focusing on cost management, field execution, project administration

competitors.name: FourKites
competitors.notes: Supply chain and logistics visibility platform

competitors.name: Orbital Insight
competitors.notes: Geospatial analytics and location intelligence

competitors.name: Glodon
competitors.notes: Construction technology and BIM solutions

competitors.name: Hemisphere GNSS
competitors.notes: GNSS technology solutions for surveying, construction, and agriculture

competitors.name: Palantir Technologies
